==== Ubuntu Women ====
* Team Meeting <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20120710|July 10th]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2012-July/003559.html|Opened]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2012-July/003575.html|extended]]</nowiki> nominations period for single open Ubuntu Women leadership position, Cheri and Elizabeth remaining on for another year
* <nowiki>[[http://fullcirclemagazine.org/issue-63/|Full Circle Magazine, Issue #63]]</nowiki> with interview of Jasna Benčić of the Ubuntu News team
* Member of project lead trio Elizabeth Krumbach <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2012-July/003571.html|wins O'Reilly Open Source Award]]</nowiki>, work with Ubuntu Women among projects mentioned
